subject: Horse Racing
Big Brown (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Michael Iavarone, who heads the syndicate that owns the Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner Big Brown, said Philadelphia Park and Monmouth Park were in the running for Big Brown’s final prep race before the Breeders’ Cup. No matter where he races, Big Brown will race on grass next. With an offer to increase the total purse of the Sept. 13 President’s Cup to $1 million should Big Brown compete, Philadelphia Park may be the leading contender. The race is currently worth $250,000.
